data.name: ProviderReturnedNullModel
data.value: Metadata model returned should not be null. Provider: {providerTypeName}.

data.name: ReadOnlyFiles
data.value: No files generated in directory {outputDirectoryName}. The following file(s) already exist and must be made writeable to continue: {readOnlyFiles}.

data.name: MissingUseProviderMethodNameAnnotation
data.value: Cannot scaffold the connection string. The "UseProviderMethodName" is missing from the scaffolding model.

data.name: ExistingFiles
data.value: The following file(s) already exist in directory {outputDirectoryName}: {existingFiles}. Use the Force flag to overwrite these files.

data.name: ColumnNameEmptyOnIndex
data.value: Found a column on index {indexName} on table {tableName} with an empty or null name. Not including column in index.

data.name: PrincipalColumnNotFound
data.value: For foreign key with identity {id} on table {tableName}, unable to find the column called {principalColumnName} on the foreign key's principal table, {principaltableName}. Skipping foreign key.

data.name: CannotFindTypeMappingForColumn
data.value: Could not find type mapping for column '{columnName}' with data type '{dateType}'. Skipping column.

data.name: ForeignKeyScaffoldErrorPrincipalKeyNotFound
data.value: Could not scaffold the foreign key '{foreignKeyName}'. A key for '{columnsList}' was not found in the principal entity type '{principalEntityType}'.

data.name: ForeignKeyScaffoldErrorPrincipalTableNotFound
data.value: Could not scaffold the foreign key '{foreignKeyName}'. The referenced table could not be found. This most likely occurred because the referenced table was excluded from scaffolding.

data.name: ForeignKeyScaffoldErrorPrincipalTableScaffoldingError
data.value: Could not scaffold the foreign key '{foreignKeyName}'. The referenced table '{principaltableName}' could not be scaffolded.

data.name: ForeignKeyScaffoldErrorPropertyNotFound
data.value: Could not scaffold the foreign key '{foreignKeyName}'. The following columns in the foreign key could not be scaffolded: {columnNames}.

data.name: PrimaryKeyErrorPropertyNotFound
data.value: Could not scaffold the primary key for '{tableName}'. The following columns in the primary key could not be scaffolded: {columnNames}.

data.name: MissingPrimaryKey
data.value: Unable to identify the primary key for table '{tableName}'.

data.name: FoundTable
data.value: Found table with name: {name}.

data.name: TableNotInSelectionSet
data.value: Table {tableName} is not included in the selection set. Skipping.

data.name: ColumnNotInSelectionSet
data.value: Column {columnName} belongs to table {tableName} which is not included in the selection set. Skipping.

data.name: FoundIndex
data.value: Found index with name: {indexName}, table: {tableName}, is unique: {isUnique}.

data.name: FoundIndexColumn
data.value: Found index column on index {indexName} on table {tableName}, column name: {columnName}, ordinal: {ordinal}.

data.name: IndexColumnNotInSelectionSet
data.value: Index column {columnName} belongs to index {indexName} on table {tableName} which is not included in the selection set. Skipping.

data.name: FoundSequence
data.value: Found sequence name: {name}, data type: {dataType}, cyclic: {isCyclic}, increment: {increment}, start: {start}, minimum: {min}, maximum: {max}.

data.name: ColumnNameEmptyOnForeignKey
data.value: Found a column on foreign key {tableName}.{fkName} with an empty or null name. Not including column in foreign key

data.name: ColumnNameEmptyOnTable
data.value: Found a column on table {tableName} with an empty or null name. Skipping column.

data.name: UnableToFindTableForIndex
data.value: For index {indexName}. Unable to find parent table {tableName}. Skipping index.

data.name: IndexNameEmpty
data.value: Found an index on table {tableName} with an empty or null name. Skipping index.

data.name: ForeignKeyNameEmpty
data.value: Found a foreign key on table {tableName} with an empty or null name. Skipping foreign key.

data.name: ForeignKeyColumnNotInSelectionSet
data.value: Foreign key column {columnName} belongs to foreign key {fkName} on table {tableName} which is not included in the selection set. Skipping.

data.name: PrincipalTableNotInSelectionSet
data.value: For foreign key {fkName} on table {tableName}, unable to model the end of the foreign key on principal table {principaltableName}. This is usually because the principal table was not included in the selection set.

data.name: UnableToGenerateEntityType
data.value: Unable to generate entity type for table '{tableName}'.

data.name: UnableToScaffoldIndexMissingProperty
data.value: Unable to scaffold the index '{indexName}'. The following columns could not be scaffolded: {columnNames}.

data.name: SequencesRequireName
data.value: Sequence name cannot be null or empty. Entity Framework cannot model a sequence that does not have a name.

data.name: BadSequenceType
data.value: For sequence '{sequenceName}'. Unable to scaffold because it uses an unsupported type: '{typeName}'.

data.name: MissingSchema
data.value: Unable to find a schema in the database matching the selected schema {schema}.

data.name: MissingTable
data.value: Unable to find a table in the database matching the selected table {table}.

data.name: ForeignKeyPrincipalEndContainsNullableColumns
data.value: The principal end of the foreign key '{foreignKeyName}' is supported by the unique index '{indexName}' and contains the following nullable columns '{columnNames}'. Entity Framework requires the properties representing those columns to be non-nullable.
